name: Cowries Adventure
description:
Cowries Adventure is a casual game with an interesting storyline. Play as young guy who was destined by the gods to succeed a thrown in Dzita but turned it down. For this disobedience, you have been casted into the spirit realms to serve your punishment and learn how to obey the gods.

Features

* Vertical mode gameplay with stunning colorful African art
* Play with your thumb
* Power-up to trigger weapon
* Boss fights
* Compete in the “Road to Freedom” leaderboard worldwide (install Play Games Services)
* Play Offline
